title: Isabella and Ferdinand 1-3
description: s/t: Castile for Isabella/Spain for the Sovereigns/Daughters of SpainWith her skilful blend of storytelling and attention to historical detail, Plaidy presents the life of Isabella of Castile. The tale unfolds from Isabella's early days at the licentious court of her brother, Henry IV, through her remarkable reign as Queen of Spain, to her tragic widowhood.
author: Jean Plaidy
